author: sky.cactus
content: I specifically need something where *no one* can decrypt until after a period of time.

author: sky.cactus
content: This would include a colluding set of keyholders.

author: sky.cactus
content: Have any details or links to details about this?

author: sky.cactus
content: The idea is that the encryption would be done by a computer running some audited code in some sort of secure environment (e.g., SGX) and the keys would immediately be thrown away and the output would become decryptable at some point later.
